Binding.name: DETAILS_RESET_SEGMENTS
Binding.description: Clear all segments.

Binding.name: DETAILS_SCROLL_DOWN
Binding.description: Scroll down the window which you have the mouse over.

Binding.name: DETAILS_SCROLL_UP
Binding.description: Scroll up the window which you have the mouse over.

Binding.name: DETAILS_REPORT_WINDOW1
Binding.description: Report data shown on window #1.

Binding.name: DETAILS_REPORT_WINDOW2
Binding.description: Report data shown on window #2.

Binding.name: DETAILS_TOGGLE_ALL
Binding.description: open or close all windows

Binding.name: DETAILS_TOOGGLE_WINDOW1
Binding.description: Toggle window 1.

Binding.name: DETAILS_TOOGGLE_WINDOW2
Binding.description: Toggle window 2.

Binding.name: DETAILS_TOOGGLE_WINDOW3
Binding.description: Toggle window 3.

Binding.name: DETAILS_TOOGGLE_WINDOW4
Binding.description: Toggle window 4.

Binding.name: DETAILS_TOOGGLE_WINDOW5
Binding.description: Toggle window 5.

Binding.name: DETAILS_BOOKMARK1
Binding.description: Change the display on the first window to bookmark #1.

Binding.name: DETAILS_BOOKMARK2
Binding.description: Change the display on the first window to bookmark #2.

Binding.description: Change the display on the first window to bookmark #3.
